alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pocahontas; Northwest Randolph; Southeast Pocahontas; Southeast Randolph (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 08 at 9:29AM EDT until October 09 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM EDT SUNDAY... ...FROST ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 expected. * WHERE...Northwest Pocahontas, Southeast Pocahontas, Northwest Randolph and Southeast Randolph Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 9 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Pocahontas; Northwest Randolph; Southeast Pocahontas; Southeast Randolph
